channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Hubs Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Hubs Cloud

item.title: CVE-2021-29979|2024-08-03T22:24:57.625Z -- mozilla -- hubs%20cloud
item.description: Hubs Cloud allows users to download shared content, specifically HTML and JS, which could allow javascript execution in the Hub Cloud instance’s primary hosting domain.*. This vulnerability affects Hubs Cloud < mozillareality/reticulum/1.0.1/20210618012634.

item.title: CVE-2021-29954|2024-08-03T22:18:03.427Z -- mozilla -- hubs%20cloud
item.description: Proxy functionality built into Hubs Cloud’s Reticulum software allowed access to internal URLs, including the metadata service. This vulnerability affects Hubs Cloud < mozillareality/reticulum/1.0.1/20210428201255.
